Dear {{lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending the La Prairie event. We hope you thoroughly enjoyed yourself. As a lover of beauty, we thought of offering you the limited edition Perrier Jouët Belle Époque 2007 “Small Discoveries” by mischer’traxler. Using the Belle-Époque Vintage 2007 bottle as a creative medium, design studio mischer’traxler reinterpreted the language of Art Nouveau. You can bring home this work of art for RSP: $288. This offer is for limited time only so we encourage you to avail of it as soon as possible. For private purchase, please contact sgsales@pernod-ricard.com.sg <[[mailto:sgsales@pernod-ricard.com.sg?subject=Private purchase for Belle Epoque 2007 Mischer’Traxler Limited Edition]]>. Your Sincerely,
Perrier-Jouët Singapore
